text: 6: A Fateful Finish
trans: 6:了结因缘

text: The crew claims victory over Albacore, but then an even larger, more menacing one appears. While the party continues to fight monsters, the Giant Albacore slowly but steadily approaches.
trans: 经过一番激战，姬塔一行终于成功打败了Albacore。就在众人看到希望之时，一只比之前更加巨大的Albacore出现在他们面前。巨大的Albacore正朝着惊愕的姬塔一行逐渐逼近，众人只好暂且先将聚集过来的魔物踢开，以便能够活动身体。

text: The battle with Albacore is long and arduous but Sig and the crew emerge victorious.
trans: 经过一番激战，姬塔一行终于成功打败了Albacore。

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: We did it but there are still so many of them.
trans: 但是……唉，那些家伙还有无数个啊……

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: Just what exactly is Albacore?
trans: Albacore到底是什么样的星晶兽？

name: Io/伊欧
text: I don't know, but for now, we've just gotta take 'em all down!
trans: 虽然不清楚，总之把它们全都打倒不就行了吗！

name: Sig
text: That's the spirit, Io! These Albacore might as well be guppies!
trans: 说得没错，伊欧酱！Albacore对我们来说已经只是单纯的猎物了！

name: Sig
text: We're just getting started. I'll show you how a real fisherman... fights...
trans: 那么……接下来就看渔夫的真本事了……咦。

name: Sig
text: What is that?
trans: 什……什么啊……那个……

name: Io/伊欧
text: Huh?
trans: 欸?

text: The crew follows Sig's gaze to the creature that looms behind Io.
trans: 听到Sig的话，大家的视线被吸引，抬头望向伊欧身后。,在那里……

name: Walder
text: Heh... Heheh... This is a joke, right?
trans: 呃……哈哈……开玩笑的吧？

name: Sig
text: That can't be real. Is this a nightmare?
trans: 那是什么啊……这难道是噩梦吗？

name: Io/伊欧
text: I wish, but it's real. My cheeks hurt from pinching.
trans: 很遗憾……这是现实。刚才我掐了下脸，很疼的。

text: The Giant Albacore slowly approaches the party while they discuss what to do.
trans: 就在他们说话的时候，Albacore开始朝姬塔慢慢移动。

name: Walder
text: What do we do? Should we defeat it? Uh, can we defeat it?
trans: 怎、怎么办！？要打倒它吗！？不、不对……打得过吗！？

name: Io/伊欧
text: It's, uh, getting closer you guys...
trans: 它、它在一点点靠近……

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: We're lucky it doesn't move very quickly. Maybe because it's so big?
trans: 或许是因为体型太大，动作不太快，这算是不幸中的万幸吗……

name: Sig
text: No, I'd hardly say luck is on our side.
trans: 不……好像也不全是好事啊……

name: Sig
text: The monsters are gathering faster.
trans: 或许是因为太大了，魔物聚集的速度比刚才还要快……

name: Io/伊欧
text: Ungh! Where are these dumb monsters coming from?
trans: 真是的！这些魔物都是从哪冒出来的啊！

name: Sig
text: Whining about it isn't going to make them leave. Suck it up and fight!
trans: 抱怨也没用。拿出勇气应战吧！姬塔！
scene_evt140731_cp6_q1_s20
